coreAttributes.name: arcane recorder
coreAttributes.description: An arcane recorder given to you by Wes. Resembling an old-fashioned camcorder, this device functions in much the same way as any old video recorder from your old reality.

effectTooltipLines.line: Capable of creating up to 30 minutes of film footage

coreAttributes.applyEffects:
Resembling an old-fashioned camcorder, this device functions in much the same way as any old video recorder from your old reality. The model code 'C4M-1L' is printed in bold letters on one side of it, while on the rear, there's a sticker proclaiming that it is the 'Property of Dominion Enforcers'.

You decide not to activate the recorder at the present moment, as you need to save the film for recording Elle's criminal activity...

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the arcane recorder...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(show)] off [npc.her] arcane recorder to [npc2.name], who is duly impressed by [npc.her] possession of such a rare device...
